channel.title: docker on Filippo B
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Filippo B

item.title: Docker 101
item.description: Build an image docker build -t fastapi_simple . Run an image locally docker run -d --name mycontainer -p 80:80 fastapi_simple Login into DockerHub docker login Tag an image docker tag fastapi_simple filippo82/fastapi_simple:0.0.1 Push an image to DockerHub docker push filippo82/fastapi_simple:0.0.1
